articles.title: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?
articles.mainIdea: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?
articles.summary: Zacks: Will Kodiak Collaboration Strengthen Verizon's Growth Prospects?. VZ teams up with Kodiak AI to bring 5G and IoT to autonomous trucks, enabling safer, smarter, and more connected freight operations. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?
articles.mainIdea: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?
articles.summary: Zacks: Will Partnership With Sovato Boost T's Prospects in Digital Health?. AT&T teams up with Sovato to expand digital healthcare access, combining 5G and cloud tools for virtual care in remote areas. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.mainIdea: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?
articles.summary: Zacks: VZ Introduces 5G Network Slice Solution: Will it Boost Prospects?. Verizon launches 5G Network Slice Enhanced Internet, offering capped-free high uplink speeds to support AI, cloud apps and enterprise use cases. Related tickers mentioned: T, T-PA, VZ.

articles.title: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal
articles.mainIdea: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal
articles.summary: The Wall Street Journal: Trump’s First-Term Trust Buster Is Now Working to Get Paramount Its Deal. Former Justice Department antitrust chief Makan Delrahim is at the center of Paramount’s bid to wrestle Warner Bros. from Netflix.

articles.title: Un-carrier Unwrapped 2025
articles.summary: Business Wire: Un-carrier Unwrapped 2025. BELLEVUE, Wash., December 22, 2025--It’s been quite a year for T-Mobile — the kind that makes you want to raise a glass to everything the Un-carrier made possible in 2025. The company officially became America’s Best Network and delivered its strongest quarter in more than a decade. Fast Company named T-Mobile one of the Best Workplaces for Innovators, recognizing a culture built to challenge the status quo.
